Java Class Library API

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.4 of the hl7lib Java library.

See:
          Description

Packages
org.dellroad.hl7 Top level package for the hl7lib Java library.
org.dellroad.hl7.io Classes relating to sending and receiving HL7 messages.
org.dellroad.hl7.llp Classes relating to HL7 "lower layer protocol" (LLP) framing.

 

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.4 of the hl7lib Java library.

hl7lib is a small Java library for parsing and manipulating version 2.x HL7 messages.

Features include:

  • Parsing and formatting
  • HL7 lower layer protocol (LLP)
  • Java API for creating, editing, and querying
  • An efficient and semantically equivalent XML encoding

Visit the hl7lib homepage at http://hl7lib.googlecode.com/.
